name: Yu(ki)
description:
Yu(ki) is an innovative re-imagining of the core concept around video games. The game both transcends genres and encompasses them. It's revolutionary control scheme allows for infinite possibilities in an immersive, open, and ever expanding world. Players will be exposed to ugly truths and hard moral choices that expose their true natures. Dive in, and see what the mirror holds.

Reviews:

"7/10 too much snow." -IGN

"The Dark Souls of video games from the Cuphead of game developers." -Polygon

"In awe of the size of this game, absolute unit." -Kotaku
